name: 3D MONSTER STUNTS
description:
Download to PLAY your FREE game "3D MONSTER STUNTS" in MULTIPLAYER within racing game category on Google play store now!

Play game in TWO modes, MULTIPLAYER & SINGLE PLAYER MODE. Start a quick race with random players online or invite your friends on google plus & facebook to play. You have an option to play as a single player too.

Select your favorite monster vehicle to race through the obstacles. Perform real stunts and drive to the finish point to win the level. Upgrade new monsters to pull off amazing tricks & stunts. Each track is exciting with fun run tracks. You need to race through the moving wheels, rotating & moving paths to perform dangerous stunts. So get ready to drive yours crazy monster machine NOW!

GAME FEATURES:-

*TWO modes – MULTIPLAYER & SINGLE PLAYER.
*100% FREE game play.
*Different trucks to upgrade with coins & race.
*NEW Realistic physics simulator to feel the amazing speed racing.
*Real 3D environments, with multiple camera views.
*Smooth simulation controls for racing & driving controls.
*Explore different worlds & new mission objectives.
*Amazing background music & sound effects.
*Google Play Game Services integrated for leader boards and achievements.
*UNLOCK new achievements to challenge your friends on leader board.
*Share on Facebook and Google Plus.

How to Play:-
Tap your phone/tablet on your right side to race, brake and control the speed.
Tap your phone or tablet on your left to control the tilt.

Check out our free games previews, game trailers, videos and more free apps in the future.

Install and Play your new game in "racing" game category – 3D MONSTER STUNTS for free on Android now!

This game is COMPATIBLE with all the major mobile devices of android phones & tablets like nexus, Samsung, LG, Nokia, Motorola, Panasonic, HTC, Sony etc above 2.2 and up.
